definition: (of a woman) old and faded
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: Do cattle and horses, when you become old, or has been abandoned patriarchal grandfather.
sentences.chinese: 做牛做马，人老珠黄时，还是被重男轻女的姥爷抛弃。

sentences.english: Men grow old, pearls grow yellow, there is no cure for it.
sentences.chinese: 人老珠黄，没有什么可以医治的。

sentences.english: Wait until you old, who will be by your side.
sentences.chinese: 等到你人老珠黄时，谁还会在你身边。
